fields.description: Authentication method used for calling the endpoint.
fields.name: Authentication

fields.description: Represents the payload that will be sent to the endpoint. Required for POST/PUT method, not allowed for GET method Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Body

fields.description: Represents the headers that will be sent to the request. For example, to set the language and type on a request: "headers" : { "Accept-Language": "en-us", "Content-Type": "application/json" }. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Headers

fields.description: Rest API method for target endpoint.
fields.name: Method

fields.description: When set to true, statusCode, output and error in callback request body will be consumed by activity. The activity can be marked as failed by setting statusCode >= 400 in callback request. Default is false. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: ReportStatusOnCallBack

fields.description: The timeout within which the webhook should be called back. If there is no value specified, it defaults to 10 minutes. Type: string. Pattern: ((\d+)\.)?(\d\d):(60|([0-5][0-9])):(60|([0-5][0-9])).
fields.name: Timeout

fields.description: WebHook activity target endpoint and path. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Url
